annotations.description: A cocktail of Fire and Blood, Flamed Mezcal, a Toast to the Mother of Dragons, Daenerys Targaryen. Maybe the best cocktail I've ever invented by the way... *...
annotations.title: Prince that was Promised | How to Drink

textContent:
one egg white
.75 oz. -or- 22 ml. Simple Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. lemon juice
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. creme de mezcal or Mezcal and spoonful of agave syrup
2 dashes 20% saline solution

dry shake
shake again
pour into coupe
garnish with angostura flamethrower

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g5q9uh7iBQQ
title: The Prince that was Promised
